title: Integrated Language Education Design Utilizing Mobile Media

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Usage Skills and Foundational Language Learning Competencies
context.additional_context: Learners are university students or job seekers aiming to expand mobile language learning experiences using smartphones/tablets. Formative assessments provide real-time feedback to strengthen self-directed learning competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can efficiently manage language learning content (audio/text/video) in asynchronous environments using mobile media
Learners perform language practice tasks (pronunciation, writing, listening) at least twice weekly and incorporate feedback via a mobile app integrated with an LMS
Learners can explain the process of uploading and analyzing/sharing language data (photos, recordings) collected offline to a digital platform
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
